title: Senior Security Analyst
content:
Established in 1981 with a single store in the Northwest of England, the JD Group is a leading omni-channel retailer of Sports Fashion, Outdoors and Gyms with over 60,000 colleagues and over 3,400 stores across several retail fascias in over 30 markets around the world.
JD Sports Fashion Plc was listed on the London Stock Exchange in 1996 and has been a FTSE100 publicly quoted company since 2019 and continues to grow in the UK and internationally.
We want to be the leading global omnichannel retailer in the sports and outdoor industry. To be a part of this successful company and help us to achieve this you will have the desire to ingrain our strategic goals of being a people-led, innovative and customer-focused organisation which provides operational excellence whilst identifying new areas of growth as part of our day to day objectives.
 
As a Senior Security Analyst, you will work in our state-of-the-art Security Operations Centre. We use the latest technologies in CCTV and Alarm monitoring.
As part of this exciting opportunity you will be responsible for the monitoring of our alarms and CCTV for all stores, gyms offices and DCs, as well as assisting in the training of our new recruits.
Our SOC is in a Ground Floor location with excellent wheelchair and disabled access, we have a secure on site parking and a subsidised canteen which offers hot and cold food throughout the shifts.
 
We offer a range of benefits with this role such as:

Discount in all stores owned by JD Sports Fashion PLC
Discounted Gym Membership
A monthly colleague recognition award
You also get discounts on EE contracts, Blackpool Pleasure Beach and much more.
Competitive Salary plus a Night Shift Allowance.
Excellent development opportunities to further your career.

 
Some of the key responsibilities:

To deal with alarm activations efficiently and update the relevant stakeholders
To ensure that all procedures in relation to the SOC are followed and escalated where necessary
To liaise with the Police/fire in relation to alarm activations
To use Technical Knowledge to assist with intruder alarm setting and activations
To update Key holders and ensure checks are made to confirm identity
To monitor CCTV in stores and report issues to the relevant manager
To prepare and send nightly reports on issues
To identify faults and escalate to Security Tech recording the incident number
To adhere to all company policies and ensure you are working within health and safety guidelines
To carry out weekly checks as per the schedule
To be professional and courteous at all times
To undertake any other reasonable activities in line with the needs of the business
To produce footage for the group as requested and ensure compliance with GDPR

Skills/Experience/Knowledge needed:

Experience of working to health and safety requirements
Must display a proactive approach to your duties
Excellent computer literacy skills as all information is recorded on databases
Able to work under pressure in a busy environment.
Works well as part of a team; supportive of others and to supplement the Duty Controller
Communicates effectively both written and oral
Respond to issues quickly, positively in a fast paced and changing environment
Experience of working in the security industry / Alarm Receiving Centre is essential
Pass the exam to the required standard once training completed.

 
 
We know our employees work tirelessly to make JD Sports the success it is today and in turn, we offer them some amazing benefits:

Staff Discount On JD Group and other brands within the organisation
Pension Scheme
Flexible Working Hours
Health plans â€“ Depending on level of role
Personal development opportunities to learn and develop at work.

Due to the high volumes of applications our opportunities attract, it takes time to review them all. If you don't hear back within two weeks of you applying, please consider your application to have been unsuccessful on this occasion
Applications that meet the skills criteria will be contacted for a 1st stage meeting with the talent team. Shortlisted candidates will then be invited to interview with the hiring manager.
Thank you again for your time.
